member.name: F:Exif.EXIFDataType.ExifTypeUnsignedRational
member.summary: Data is fractional: each item in the data is 8 bytes long. The first 4 bytes of each item in the data contain the numerator (unsigned int), the second 4 bytes the denominator (also unsigned int).

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFDataType.ExifTypeUndefined
member.summary: Data has arbitrary data mPID, tag specific

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFDataType.ExifTypeSignedRational
member.summary: Data is fractional: each item in the data is 8 bytes long. The first 4 bytes of each item in the data contain the numerator (signed int), the second 4 bytes the denominator (also signed int).

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFGPSCode.GPSAltitudeRef
member.summary: Info Altitude 0 = Above Sea Level ,1 = Below Sea Level

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.InteroperabilityIndex
member.summary: If this IFD is main image's IFD and the file content is equivalent to ExifR98 v1.0, the value is "R98". If thumbnail image's, value is "THM". Ascii string 4

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.InteroperabilityVersion
member.summary: Records the interoperability version. "0100" means version 1.00. Undefined 4

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ImageDescription
member.summary: Describes image. Two-byte character code such as Chinese/Korean/Japanese cannot be used. ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Manufacturer
member.summary: Manfacturer of digicam. In the Exif standard, this tag is optional, but it is mandatory for DCF. ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Model
member.summary: Shows model number of digicam. In the Exif standard, this tag is optional, but it is mandatory for DCF. ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ImageWidth
member.summary: Shows size of thumbnail image. unsigned short/long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ImageLength
member.summary: Shows size of thumbnail image. unsigned short/long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.BitsPerSample
member.summary: When image format is no compression, this value shows the number of bits per component for each pixel. Usually this value is '8,8,8' unsigned short 3

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Compression
member.summary: Shows compression method. '1' means no compression, '6' means JPEG compression. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.PhotometricInterpretation
member.summary: Shows the color space of the image data components. '1' means monochrome, '2' means RGB, '6' means YCbCr. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.StripOffsets
member.summary: When image format is no compression, this value shows offset to image data. In some case image data is striped and this value is plural. unsigned short/long

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Orientation
member.summary: The orientation of the camera relative to the scene, when the image was captured. The relation of the '0th row' and '0th column' to visual position is shown as right. 1 top left side 2 top right side 3 bottom right side 4 bottom left side 5 left side top 6 right side top 7 right side bottom 8 left side bottom unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.SamplesPerPixel
member.summary: When image format is no compression, this value shows the number of components stored for each pixel. At color image, this value is '3'. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.RowsPerStrip
member.summary: When image format is no compression and image has stored as strip, this value shows how many rows stored to each strip. If image has not striped, this value is the same as ImageLength(0x0101). unsigned short/long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.StripByteConunts
member.summary: When image format is no compression and stored as strip, this value shows how many bytes used for each strip and this value is plural. If image has not stripped, this value is single and means whole data size of image. unsigned short/long

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.PlanarConfiguration
member.summary: When image format is no compression YCbCr, this value shows byte aligns of YCbCr data. If value is '1', Y/Cb/Cr value is chunky format, contiguous for each subsampling pixel. If value is '2', Y/Cb/Cr value is separated and stored to Y plane/Cb plane/Cr plane format. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.XResolution
member.summary: Display/Print resolution of image. Default value is 1/72inch, but it has no mean because personal computer doesn't use this value to display/print out. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.YResolution
member.summary: Display/Print resolution of image. Default value is 1/72inch, but it has no mean because personal computer doesn't use this value to display/print out. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ResolutionUnit2
member.summary: Unit of XResolution(0x011a)/YResolution(0x011b). '1' means no-unit, '2' means inch, '3' means centimeter. Default value is '2'(inch). unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Software
member.summary: Shows firmware(internal software of digicam) version number. ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.DateTime
member.summary: Date/Time of image was last modified. Data format is "YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS"+0x00, total 20bytes. If clock has not set or digicam doesn't have clock, the field may be filled with spaces. In usual, it has the same value of DateTimeOriginal(0x9003) ascii string 20

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.WhitePoint
member.summary: Defines chromaticity of white point of the image. If the image uses CIE Standard Illumination D65(known as international standard of 'daylight'), the values are '3127/10000,3290/10000'. unsigned rational 2

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.PrimaryChromaticities
member.summary: Defines chromaticity of the primaries of the image. If the image uses CCIR Recommendation 709 primaries, values are '640/1000,330/1000,300/1000,600/1000,150/1000,0/1000'. unsigned rational 6

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.JpegIFOffset
member.summary: When image format is JPEG, this value show offset to JPEG data stored. unsigned long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.JpegIFByteCount
member.summary: When image format is JPEG, this value shows data size of JPEG image. unsigned long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.YCbCrSubSampling
member.summary: When image format is YCbCr and uses subsampling(cropping of chroma data, all the digicam do that), this value shows how many chroma data subsampled. First value shows horizontal, next value shows vertical subsample rate. unsigned short 2

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.YCbCrCoefficients
member.summary: When image format is YCbCr, this value shows a constant to translate it to RGB format. In usual, values are '0.299/0.587/0.114'. unsigned rational 3

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.YCbCrPositioning
member.summary: When image format is YCbCr and uses 'Subsampling'(cropping of chroma data, all the digicam do that), defines the chroma sample point of subsampling pixel array. '1' means the center of pixel array, '2' means the datum point. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ReferenceBlackWhite
member.summary: Shows reference value of black point/white point. In case of YCbCr format, first 2 show black/white of Y, next 2 are Cb, last 2 are Cr. In case of RGB format, first 2 show black/white of R, next 2 are G, last 2 are B. unsigned rational 6

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExifIFDPointer
member.summary: unsigned long 1 Offset to Exif Sub IFD

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExposureTime
member.summary: Exposure time (reciprocal of shutter speed). Unit is second. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FNumber
member.summary: The actual F-number(F-stop) of lens when the image was taken. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExposureProgram
member.summary: Exposure program that the camera used when image was taken. '1' means manual control, '2' program normal, '3' aperture priority, '4' shutter priority, '5' program creative (slow program), '6' program action(high-speed program), '7' portrait mode, '8' landscape mode. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ISOSpeedRatings
member.summary: CCD sensitivity equivalent to Ag-Hr film speedrate. unsigned short 2

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExifVersion
member.summary: Exif version number. Stored as 4bytes of ASCII character. If the picture is based on Exif V2.1, value is "0210". Since the mPID is 'undefined', there is no NULL(0x00) for termination. undefined 4

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.DateTimeOriginal
member.summary: Date/Time of original image taken. This value should not be modified by user program. Data format is "YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS"+0x00, total 20bytes. If clock has not set or digicam doesn't have clock, the field may be filled with spaces. In the Exif standard, this tag is optional, but it is mandatory for DCF. ascii string 20

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.DateTimeDigitized
member.summary: Date/Time of image digitized. Usually, it contains the same value of DateTimeOriginal(0x9003). Data format is "YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS"+0x00, total 20bytes. If clock has not set or digicam doesn't have clock, the field may be filled with spaces. In the Exif standard, this tag is optional, but it is mandatory for DCF. ascii string 20

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ComponentsConfiguration
member.summary: Shows the order of pixel data. Most of case '0x04,0x05,0x06,0x00' is used for RGB-format and '0x01,0x02,0x03,0x00' for YCbCr-format. 0x00:does not exist, 0x01:Y, 0x02:Cb, 0x03:Cr, 0x04:Red, 0x05:Green, 0x06:Bllue. undefined

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.CompressedBitsPerPixel
member.summary: The average compression ratio of JPEG (rough estimate). unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ShutterSpeedValue
member.summary: Shutter speed by APEX value. To convert this value to ordinary 'Shutter Speed'; calculate this value's power of 2, then reciprocal. For example, if the ShutterSpeedValue is '4', shutter speed is 1/(24)=1/16 second. signed rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ApertureValue
member.summary: The actual aperture value of lens when the image was taken. Unit is APEX. To convert this value to ordinary F-number(F-stop), calculate this value's power of root 2 (=1.4142). For example, if the ApertureValue is '5', F-number is Pow(1.4142,5) = F5.6. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.BrightnessValue
member.summary: Brightness of taken subject, unit is APEX. To calculate Exposure(Ev) from BrigtnessValue(Bv), you must add SensitivityValue(Sv). Ev=Bv+Sv Sv=log2(ISOSpeedRating/3.125) ISO100:Sv=5, ISO200:Sv=6, ISO400:Sv=7, ISO125:Sv=5.32. signed rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExposureBiasValue
member.summary: Exposure bias(compensation) value of taking picture. Unit is APEX(EV). signed rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.MaxApertureValue
member.summary: Maximum aperture value of lens. You can convert to F-number by calculating power of root 2 (same process of ApertureValue:0x9202). unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.SubjectDistance
member.summary: Distance to focus point, unit is meter. signed rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.MeteringMode
member.summary: Exposure metering method. '0' means unknown, '1' average, '2' center weighted average, '3' spot, '4' multi-spot, '5' multi-JPEGSegment, '6' partial, '255' other. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.LightSource
member.summary: Light source, actually this means white balance setting. '0' means unknown, '1' daylight, '2' fluorescent, '3' tungsten, '10' flash, '17' standard light A, '18' standard light B, '19' standard light C, '20' D55, '21' D65, '22' D75, '255' other. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.Flash
member.summary: '0' means flash did not fire, '1' flash fired, '5' flash fired but strobe return light not detected, '7' flash fired and strobe return light detected. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FocalLength
member.summary: Focal length of lens used to take image. Unit is millimeter. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.MakerNote
member.summary: Maker dependent internal data. Some of maker such as Olympus/Nikon/Sanyo etc. uses IFD format for this area. undefined

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.UserComment
member.summary: Stores user comment. This tag allows to use two-byte character code or unicode. First 8 bytes describe the character code. 'JIS' is a Japanese character code (known as Kanji). '0x41,0x53,0x43,0x49,0x49,0x00,0x00,0x00':ASCII '0x4a,0x49,0x53,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00':JIS '0x55,0x4e,0x49,0x43,0x4f,0x44,0x45,0x00':Unicode '0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00':Undefined undefined

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.SubsecTime
member.summary: Some of digicam can take 2~30 pictures per second, but DateTime/DateTimeOriginal/DateTimeDigitized tag can't record the sub-second time. SubsecTime tag is used to record it. For example, DateTimeOriginal = "1996:09:01 09:15:30", SubSecTimeOriginal = "130", Combined original time is "1996:09:01 09:15:30.130" ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FlashPixVersion
member.summary: Stores FlashPix version. If the image data is based on FlashPix formar Ver.1.0, value is "0100". Since the mPID is 'undefined', there is no NULL(0x00) for termination. undefined 4

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ColorSpace
member.summary: Defines Color Space. DCF image must use sRGB color space so value is always '1'. If the picture uses the other color space, value is '65535':Uncalibrated. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExifImageWidth
member.summary: Size of main image. unsigned short/long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExifImageHeight
member.summary: Size of main image unsigned short/long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.RelatedSoundFile
member.summary: If this digicam can record audio data with image, shows name of audio data. ascii string

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExifInteroperabilityOffset
member.summary: Extension of "ExifR98", detail is unknown. This value is offset to IFD format data. Currently there are 2 directory entries, first one is Tag0x0001, value is "R98", next is Tag0x0002, value is "0100". unsigned long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FocalPlaneXResolution
member.summary: Pixel density at CCD's position. If you have MegaPixel digicam and take a picture by lower resolution(e.header.VGA mode), this value is re-sampled by picture resolution. In such case, FocalPlaneResolution is not same as CCD's actual resolution. unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
member.summary: Unit of FocalPlaneXResoluton/FocalPlaneYResolution. '1' means no-unit, '2' inch, '3' centimeter. Note:Some of Fujifilm's digicam(e.header.FX2700,FX2900,Finepix4700Z/40i etc) uses value '3' so it must be 'centimeter', but it seems that they use a '8.3mm?'(1/3in.?) to their ResolutionUnit. Fuji's BUG? Finepix4900Z has been changed to use value '2' but it doesn't match to actual value also. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.ExposureIndex
member.summary: Same as ISOSpeedRatings(0x8827) but data mPID is unsigned rational. Only Kodak's digicam uses this tag instead of ISOSpeedRating, I don't know why(historical reason?). unsigned rational 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.SensingMethod
member.summary: Shows mPID of image sensor unit. '2' means 1 chip color area sensor, most of all digicam use this mPID. unsigned short 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.FileSource
member.summary: Indicates the image source. Value '0x03' means the image source is digital still camera. undefined 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.SceneType
member.summary: Indicates the mPID of scene. Value '0x01' means that the image was directly photographed. undefined 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.CFAPattern
member.summary:
Indicates the Color filter array(CFA) geometric pattern. Length Type Meaning 2 short Horizontal repeat pixel unit = n 2 short Vertical repeat pixel unit = m 1 byte CFA value[0,0] 1 byte CFA value[n-1,0] 1 byte CFA value[0,1] 1 byte CFA value[n-1,m-1]
The relation of filter color to CFA value is shown below. Red = 0 Green = 1 Blue = 2 Cyan = 3 Magenta = 4 Yellow = 5 White = 6
undefined

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.RelatedImageFileFormat
member.summary: Records the file format of image file. Value is ascii string (e.header. "Exif JPEG Ver. 2.1"). Ascii string any

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.RelatedImageWidth
member.summary: Records the image size. Short or Long 1

member.name: F:Exif.EXIFCode.RelatedImageLength
member.summary: Records the image size Short or Long 1

member.name: P:Exif.XMPPerson.Rectangle
member.summary: Rectangle où la personne est identifiée

member.name: M:Exif.JPGFileData.SaveJPG(System.String)
member.summary: Sauvegarde les modifications apportées aux segments Exif et http, puis recopie tout le reste

member.name: M:Exif.JPGFileData.Synthèse
member.summary: Synthèse des informations contenues dans les tags

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.DateTaken
member.summary: Date de la prise de vue

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.DateTimeDigitized
member.summary: The date and time when the image was stored as digital data

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.ComponentsConfiguration
member.summary: Information specific to compressed data. The channels of each component are arranged in order from the 1st component to the 4th

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.SubsecTimeOriginal
member.summary: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeOriginal tag.

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.SubsecTimeDigitized
member.summary: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeDigitized tag.

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.FocalLengthIn35mmFormat
member.summary: Indicates the equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm.

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude du lieu de prise de vue

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude du lieu de prise de vue

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.Segments
member.summary: Liste des segments de la photo

member.name: P:Exif.JPGFileData.XmpMetadata
member.summary: Méta données au format Adobe Xmp
